heading: about me
text:
Hi, I am Theo! With experience of 3 years as a web developer (2 years frontend and 1 year full stack), currently working in the Silicon Valley of Europe, Amsterdam! At the moment I am working in talent acquisition and career website development tech industry. My core skills are JavaScript/JSX/ES6 and React JS.

I like cooking some code on the side. Lately with React/Node/Express/MySQL and always eager to learn new tech like VueJs, GraphQL, etc.

Besides coding and learning, I like to read books (or listening audiobooks), lifting weights, a bit of yoga or meditation and making cocktails like Passion Star Martini at events with friends and colleagues.
